metadata.title: Potato and Mixed Veggies- Indian Mashed Potatoes Recipe
metadata.description: Potato and mixed veggie masala or Indian style mashed potatoes. This can served with Roti, poori or dosa.

en: [00:00.000] Potato masala or Indian style mashed potatoes.
[00:04.500] Peel and cook the potatoes until fork tender and keep aside.
[00:10.000] Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
[00:14.000] Add mustard seeds and let them splutter.
[00:18.000] Add chana dal and urad dal and let them turn golden.
[00:23.000] Add dried red chilies, curry leaves and cumin seeds.
[00:28.000] Sauté until the cumin seeds turn light brown.
[00:33.000] Add chopped onions and salt, sauté well.
[00:38.000] Add green chilies and minced ginger.
[00:42.000] Sauté until the onions turn translucent.
[00:46.000] Add turmeric powder and mix well.
[00:49.000] Add cooked potatoes and mash lightly.
[00:54.000] Add green peas and mix well.
[00:58.000] Add water and cook covered for a few minutes.
[01:03.000] Mash the potatoes to desired consistency.
[01:07.000] Add chopped cilantro and combine well.
[01:12.000] Taste and adjust salt if needed.
[01:16.000] Serve with dosa, poori or chapati.
